T02D2030:118a-1: rakta ya m'a ri ba lim bi dhi:/
T02D2030:118a-3: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gtor ma'i cho ga /
T02D2030:118a-4: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2030:118a-5: // de la slob dpon rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan
T02D2030:118a-6: pas mdun du gtor ma shing rta'i steng bkang ba'i
T02D2030:118a-7: // snod rnams sam / tha na bza' ba tsam dang bcas pa'i chu khyor ba gsum bshams la /
T02D2030:118a-8: de nas khro bo phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags
T02D2030:118a-9: pa bsnams pa spros pas phyogs skyong rnams kyi snying
T02D2030:118a-10: gnas lcags kyus phug cing ske nas zhags pas bcings
T02D2030:118a-12: de la aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat dushta aindra /
T02D2030:118a-13: sa pa ri b'a ra a'a karsha ya dza:sv'a h'a /
T02D2030:118b-0: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dbang po spyan stong @118b
T02D2030:118b-1: dang ldan pa ser skya glang po che la 'dug
T02D2030:118b-2: pa g-yas pa dang cig shos na rdo rje dang
T02D2030:118b-3: sdigs mdzub mdzad pa bkug la shar du gzhag par
T02D2030:118b-4: bya'o // sngags de nyid kyis nye dbang nam mkha' lding la zhon pa sngon po /
T02D2030:118b-5: rin po che'i cod pan can g-yas na be con dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa /
T02D2030:118b-6: g-yon na dung dang nor bu thogs pa de nyid
T02D2030:118b-7: kyi g-yon du ha cang mi ring bar gzhag go
T02D2030:118b-8: // slar yang de nyid kyis gshin rje sngon po
T02D2030:118b-9: ma he la zhon pa skra dmar ser gyen du
T02D2030:118b-10: 'bar ba la gnad byug pa dang sdigs mdzub can
T02D2030:118b-11: gshin rje'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2030:118b-12: yang de nyid kyis chu lha dkar po brang 'gro
T02D2030:118b-13: la zhon pa lag na klu'i zhags pa thogs pa
T02D2030:118b-15: yang de nyid kyis lus ngan ser po sha rgyas
T02D2030:118b-16: pa gter la gnas pa phyag na shing thog b'i
T02D2030:118b-17: dza p'u ra dang ne'u le thogs pa byang du
T02D2030:118b-18: gzhag par bya'o // yang de nyid kyis tshogs bdag
T02D2030:118b-19: glang sna dkar po byi ba la gnas pa phyag
T02D2030:118b-20: g-yas pa na bgrang phreng dang dgra sta thogs pa
T02D2030:118b-21: gzhag par bya'o // / g-yon na la phug dang
T02D2030:118b-22: la du thogs pa de nyid kyi g-yon du ha
T02D2030:118b-23: cang mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2030:118b-24: yang de nyid kyis dbang ldan dkar po glang la
T02D2030:118b-25: zhon pa ral pa'i thor cog 'dzin pa phyag na
T02D2030:118b-26: rtse gsum dang thod pa can phyag gnyis kyis goo
T02D2030:118b-27: r'i la 'khyud pa dbang ldan du dgod par bya'o
T02D2030:118b-28: // yang de nyid kyis me lha dmar bo skyes
T02D2030:118b-29: la zhon pa bgrang 'phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa
T02D2030:118b-31: slar de nyid kyis srin po ro la zhon pa
T02D2030:118b-32: phyag na gri gug dang thod pa can khro zhing
T02D2030:118b-33: rdom [*rngom?] pa bden bral du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2030:118b-34: yang de nyid kyis rlung lha du ba'i mdog can ri dvags ser po la zhon pa /
T02D2030:118b-35: rlung ras 'dzin pa rlung du dgod par bya'o //
T02D2030:118b-36: yang de nyid kyis zla ba dkar po rta dkar
T02D2030:118b-37: po la gnas pa phyag na ku mu da 'dzin
T02D2030:118b-39: yang de nyid kyis nyi ma dmar po phyag gnyis
T02D2030:118b-40: kyis nyi ma 'dzin pa rta bdun la gnas pa
T02D2030:118b-42: de nyid kyis tshangs pa ser po zhal ba zhi
T02D2030:118b-43: pa ril ba spyi blugs dang mi 'jigs pa dang
T02D2030:118b-44: dbyug pa dang phreng ba thogs pa ral pa'i tho
T02D2030:118b-45: cog gis brgyan pa ngang pa la bzhugs pa steng
T02D2030:118b-46: du gzhag go // yang de nyid kyis sa'i lha mo ser mo padma la bzhugs pa /
T02D2030:119a-0: @119a * // g-yon na bum pa bsnams pa g-yas pa dbang po khas len pa 'og tu gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2030:119a-1: yang de nyid kyis thags zangs ris sngon po shing rta la bzhugs pa /
T02D2030:119a-2: phyag g-yas pa dang cig shos na /
T02D2030:119a-3: ral gri dang sdigs mdzub can de nyid du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2030:119a-4: de nas rang gi snying gar khro bo gshin rje
T02D2030:119a-5: gshed mthar byed kyi ngo bo khro bo'i phur bus
T02D2030:119a-6: mgrin pa nas bzung ba rnams spros te de rnams
T02D2030:119a-8: mgrin pa dang rkang pa'i bar du sngags 'dis gdab par bya'o //
T02D2030:119a-9: aom hr'i:shtri:wikri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat h'um
T02D2030:119a-10: sarba aindra di na sa pa ri w'a r'an k'i
T02D2030:119a-12: de ltar phur bu btab pa'i mjug thogs su grub
T02D2030:119a-13: pa'i bcud len grub pa bzhin du thams cad gshin
T02D2030:119a-14: rje mthar byed kyi rnam par bskyed par bya ste
T02D2030:119a-15: / thams cad kyang rang gi shes rab ma dang
T02D2030:119a-16: gnyis su med par gyur pa ni shes rab kyi
T02D2030:119a-17: phyag gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa dang ldan
T02D2030:119a-19: thams cad g-yon brkyang gi stabs kyis sgrub pa po'i
T02D2030:119a-20: bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad pa'o zhes rnam par bsams
T02D2030:119a-21: la / de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa rnams
T02D2030:119a-22: su ji ltar gsungs pa'i rdo rje mig la sogs
T02D2030:119a-23: la / pa bskyed la / lus la sogs pa
T02D2030:119a-24: la rdo rje'i sku la sogs pa dang ji ltar
T02D2030:119a-25: gsungs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang gshin rje mthar byed
T02D2030:119a-26: kyi dbu rgyan nyid kyang rnam par bsams nas mchod
T02D2030:119a-27: la / pa bskyed la / yon dang / zhabs
T02D2030:119a-28: bsil dang bsang gtor dang zhal bsil la sogs pa
T02D2030:119a-29: la / pa bskyed la / yon dang / phul
T02D2030:119a-30: te / gtor ma'i nye bar spyod pa ji snyed
T02D2030:119a-31: pa thams cad bdud rtsi lnga bsgrub pa'i rim pas
T02D2030:119a-32: bsgrubs la de nyid gsum gyis mngon par bsngags nas
T02D2030:119a-33: la / pa bskyed la / yon dang / phul
T02D2030:119a-34: te / / yang de rnams kyi ljags rdo rje'i
T02D2030:119a-35: sbyor bas bsgoms la de nas sngags 'dis bdud rtsi
T02D2030:119a-36: la / pa bskyed la / yon dang / phul
T02D2030:119a-37: te / / dbul bar bya'o // aom aindra ya
T02D2030:119a-38: la / pa bskyed la / yon dang / phul
T02D2030:119a-39: te / / dbul bar bya'o // hr'i:/ ya ma
T02D2030:119a-40: la / pa bskyed la / yon dang / phul
T02D2030:119a-41: te / / dbul bar bya'o // hr'i:/ ya shtri:/
T02D2030:119a-51: ba su dha ra ye phat /
T02D2030:119a-52: be ma tsi tri ni sv'a /
T02D2030:119a-58: de nas me tog dang bdug spos dang /
T02D2030:119a-61: zhal zas la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2030:119b-0: @119b de rnams kyis kyang sgrub pa po la dgyes
T02D2030:119b-1: pas thams cad myangs shing nye bar longs spyod par
T02D2030:119b-2: byed do // de nas rdo rje gsor zhing rdo
T02D2030:119b-3: rje dril bu 'gying ba dang bcas pas dkrol bar
T02D2030:119b-4: brtson pas gti mug rdo rje zhes bya ba la
T02D2030:119b-5: sogs pas de rnams bstod par bya'o //
T02D2030:119b-6: de nas 'dod pa'i don du gsol ba btab la gshegs su gsol te /
T02D2030:119b-9: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D2030:119b-10: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D2030:119b-11: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D2030:119b-12: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2030:119b-14: mu:/ zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2030:119b-15: de rnams kyis kyang sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don sgrub par mdzad do //
T02D2030:119b-16: gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2030:119b-18: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rdo rje
T02D2030:119b-19: btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang
T02D2030:119b-20: chag lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi dpal gyis
